api_list.name: /pair/{id}
api_list.description: Return the info of the Par by the address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com/pair/0xb011eeaab8bf0c6de75510128da95498e4b7e67f"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /uniswapFactory
api_list.description: Return the info like pair count of Uniswap V2
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com/uniswapFactory"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com/uniswapFactory"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniswap-v2-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

pairCount.description: amount of pairs created by the Uniswap factory

totalVolumeUSD.description: all time USD volume across all pairs (USD is derived)

totalVolumeETH.description: all time volume in ETH across all pairs (ETH is derived)

untrackedVolumeUSD.description: amount of token in USD traded all time across pairs (no minimum liquidity threshold)

totalLiquidityUSD.description: total liquidity across all pairs stored as a derived USD amount

totalLiquidityETH.description: total liquidity across all pairs stored as a derived ETH amount

txCount.description: all time amount of transactions across all pairs
